name: How long can you Dodge? (Official)
description:
Use WASD or Arrow keys to move

If it shows you loose when you start then click the flag button again

i do not own the rainbows voicelines and i did not hire an actor

coding 100% done by me

Music by: Rjac25

dodge stuff to win and stuff

but  it wont be that easy... theres a box to make sure you dont cheat and also things that make you loose hp Get the highest score

Hard mode will be a separate game page
